subject: 🚀 Codeforces Contest Tomorrow at 8 PM – Get Ready!
summary: The Codeforces Rated Contest, featuring algorithmic challenges on topics like Dynamic Programming, Graphs, and Greedy algorithms, will be held tomorrow, March 18, 2025, at 8:00 PM IST for 2 hours on the Codeforces platform, and is open to all registered users.

subject: 🎉 Congratulations! You’re Selected for the Next Round at Google 🚀
summary: The candidate has been selected for the next round of interviews at Google on March 23, 2025, the type and exact time of which will be communicated shortly via calendar invite, and they should confirm their availability by replying to the email.

subject: 🚀 Reminder: Tech Talk on Improving Competitive Programming Skills – Join Us Tomorrow!
summary: The Competitive Programming Club invites members to a Tech Talk on improving competitive programming skills, featuring strategies, common mistake avoidance, resource recommendations, and a Q&A, taking place on Zoom tomorrow, March 20, 2025, at 10:00 AM with [Guest Speaker / Senior CP Member].
